humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that all 8 assessed sentinel lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/8). This matches with the new rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 8 sentinel lymph nodes were excised and examined, and no metastases were found in any of them (0/8). This indicates that the cancer has not spread to the lymph nodes, which is consistent with an N0 stage.
